medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on blue paper
title: Roman Soldier and Woman Fleeing Man Armed with a Shovel
marks:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [Luigi Savatell
description: man at right wearing armor and holding a shield, running toward right, looking behind him; woman behind man running with her arms stretched out in front of her, looking back; another man with dark hair and beard running toward couple, hitting soward out of soldier\'s hand with a shovel
